query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS drip_content (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  lessonId INT NOT NULL,
  unlockType ENUM('immediate', 'date', 'days_after_enrollment', 'after_previous') DEFAULT 'immediate',
  unlockDate DATETIME NULL,
  unlockAfterDays INT DEFAULT 0,
  isLocked TINYINT DEFAULT 0,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  UNIQUE KEY unique_lesson (lessonId)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user cYPAHDVF1MZtM6S.6044338ada58 --database cwh3JmcrqYgAZTUAinEMzM --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS drip_content (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  lessonId INT NOT NULL,
  unlockType ENUM('immediate', 'date', 'days_after_enrollment', 'after_previous') DEFAULT 'immediate',
  unlockDate DATETIME NULL,
  unlockAfterDays INT DEFAULT 0,
  isLocked TINYINT DEFAULT 0,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  UNIQUE KEY unique_lesson (lessonId)
);
